DOC.brief_title: Pre-operative Epirubicin , Cisplatin , Capecitabine Patients With Newly Diagnosed Localised Oesophageal Adenocarcinoma
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year . Histologically verified adenocarcinoma thoracic oesophagus type 1 , 2 3 tumour oesophagogastric junction ( type 1 refers low oesophageal , type 2 refers cardial type 3 refers subcardinal cancer ) . AJCC Stage IIIII ( T23 N01 M0 ) ( 28 ) , assessed spiral multislice CT endoscopic ultrasound , primary surgery would consider curative intent . No previous chemotherapy , radiotherapy investigational drug treatment indication . WHO performance status 0,1 2 . Adequate bone marrow function platelet > 100 x 109/l ; WBC > 3 x 109/l ; neutrophil > 1.5 x 109/l time study entry . Serum bilirubin < 35 mol/l . Serum creatinine < 180 mol/l measure creatinine clearance 60ml/min . No concurrent uncontrolled medical condition . No previous malignant disease nonmelanotic skin cancer carcinoma situ uterine cervix last 10 year . Life expectancy > 3 month . Adequate contraceptive precaution relevant . Informed write consent . The presence locally advance metastatic disease preclude curative surgical resection ( T4 Stage IV M1ab ) Total dysphagia ( O'Rourke 's swallow function score system 5 ) preclude swallow capecitabine even crush Medical psychiatric condition compromise patient 's ability give inform consent .
